TopicTitle: my game loading is stuck ant my mod at the start

Articles.Content:
so when i start ksp up to test my mod that i added a new part too , it loads everything but it gets stuck on my mod .

 

does anyone know how to fix this.
I feel like this should go in Modded support.

A number of issues can cause a game freeze - I've found the following (and I'm sure there are many more)

  •         Node1_1 in Unity - KSP does not like underscore in names
  •         Transfom is not child of GameObject - either missing or not under main GameObject
  •         Misconfigured "MODULE {}"
  •         Node transforms are case sensitive - StackTop was Stacktop in Unity.
  •         Using NODE { name = StackTop} but in Unity object is named "StackTopp"
Also, could we see your mod files maybe? That might help.
